fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 2Y CAD Diff
fixes.dax_expression:
SUMX(
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)',
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY 2Y CAD] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Mapped each column reference to the table-qualified format and translated the row-level multiplication into a measure by aggregating the per-row product with SUMX so the result is a scalar measure. Date Sign remains referenced as a column within the SUMX iterator.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The referenced calculated field 'Date Sign' relies on Tableau [Parameters], and per rules any formula that references parameters must be converted to a measure. Additionally, measures must return a scalar, so the row-level product is aggregated using SUMX.
